mapper.select: select diary_id, diary_content, diary_img, member_id, mood_id, weather_id, DATE_FORMAT(created_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_dt from t_diary where DATE_FORMAT(created_dt, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m') and deleted_yn = 'N' and member_id=#{memberId} and share_room_id is null order by created_dt desc

select diary_id, diary_content, diary_img, member_id, mood_id, weather_id, DATE_FORMAT(created_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_dt from t_diary where YEAR(created_dt) = YEAR(#{createdDt}) and MONTH(created_dt) = MONTH(#{createdDt}) and deleted_yn = 'N' and member_id=#{memberId} and share_room_id is null order by created_dt desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_diary (member_id, diary_content, diary_img, mood_id, weather_id, created_dt) values (#{memberId}, #{diaryContent}, #{diaryImg}, #{moodId}, #{weatherId}, now())
mapper.delete: update t_diary set deleted_yn = "Y", deleted_dt = now() where diary_id = #{diaryId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, m.member_name, sm.share_room_id, sr.share_room_name FROM t_member m INNER JOIN (t_share_room sr INNER JOIN t_share_member sm ON sr.share_room_id = sm.share_room_id) ON m.member_id = sm.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} order by share_room_id desc

SELECT sr.share_room_id, sr.share_room_name, d.diary_id, d.diary_content, d.created_dt, m.member_name, d.mood_id, d.weather_id, d.diary_img FROM t_member m INNER JOIN ( t_share_room sr INNER JOIN t_diary d ON sr.share_room_id = d.share_room_id) ON m.member_id = d.member_id WHERE sr.share_room_id = #{shareRoomId} AND DATE_FORMAT(created_dt, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m')

SELECT sr.share_room_id, sr.share_room_name, d.diary_id, d.diary_content, d.created_dt, m.member_name, d.mood_id, d.weather_id FROM t_member m INNER JOIN ( t_share_room sr INNER JOIN t_diary d ON sr.share_room_id = d.share_room_id) ON m.member_id = d.member_id WHERE sr.share_room_id = #{shareRoomId} AND DATE_FORMAT(created_dt, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{createdDt}, '%Y-%m')
mapper.insert: insert into t_diary(member_id, diary_content, share_room_id, diary_img, mood_id, weather_id, created_dt) values (#{memberId}, #{diaryContent}, #{shareRoomId}, #{diaryImg}, #{moodId}, #{weatherId}, now())
mapper.select: select diary_id, member_id, share_room_id, diary_content, created_dt, diary_img, mood_id, weather_id from t_diary where share_room_id = #{shareRoomId} and DATE_FORMAT(created_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{createdDt}, '%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT share_room_id FROM t_share_room WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY share_room_id desc LIMIT 1
select member_id, goal_id, goal_contents, goal_date, goal_state from t_goal where member_id=#{memberId} and DATE_FORMAT(goal_date,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{goalDate},'%Y-%m')
mapper.insert: insert into t_goal (member_id, goal_contents, goal_date, goal_state) values (#{memberId}, #{goalContents}, #{goalDate}, #{goalState})
